title: Installation issue: hdf5
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install hdf5
==> openmpi@1.10.7 : has external module in mpi/openmpi-x86_64
==> openmpi@1.10.7 : is actually installed in None
==> openmpi@1.10.7 : already registered in DB
==> zlib is already installed in /home/juncheng/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/zlib-1.2.11-64vg6e4evdrlqgx7iicwhu2hs7lv6gpz
==> Installing hdf5
==> Searching for binary cache of hdf5
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for hdf5 found: installing from source
==> Error: AttributeError: Query of package 'openmpi' for 'headers' failed
	prefix : None
	spec : openmpi@1.10.7%gcc@4.8.5~cuda+cxx_exceptions fabrics=none ~java~legacylaunchers~memchecker~pmi schedulers=none ~sqlite3~thread_multiple+vt arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
	queried as : openmpi
	extra parameters : []

/home/juncheng/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py:783, in child_process:
        780            tb_string = traceback.format_exc()
        781
        782            # build up some context from the offending package so we can
  >>    783            # show that, too.
        784            package_context = get_package_context(tb)
        785
        786            build_log = None
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux max 3.10.0-957.1.3.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Nov 29 14:49:43 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	CentOS Linux release 7.6.1810 (Core)
``` 
and, if relevant, post or attach:
- `packages.yaml`
```
packages:
  openmpi:
    version: [1.10.7]
    modules:
        openmpi@1.10.7: mpi/openmpi-x86_64
```

### Additional information

Sometimes the issue benefits from additional details. In these cases there are
a few things we can suggest doing. First of all, you can post the full output of:
```console
$ spack spec --install-status hdf5
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   hdf5

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   hdf5@1.10.5%gcc@4.8.5~cxx~debug~fortran~hl+mpi+pic+shared~szip~threadsafe arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^openmpi@1.10.7%gcc@4.8.5~cuda+cxx_exceptions fabrics=none ~java~legacylaunchers~memchecker~pmi schedulers=none ~sqlite3~thread_multiple+vt arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.8.5+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
```
to show people whether Spack installed a faulty software or if it was not able to
build it at all.
